AbilityTooltips.slardar_sprint:
Great for catching enemies as well as your escape mechanism, be careful at that 15% bonus damage dealt to you, EitherGet 2 levels of these and max out bash, or max this.
And By 6.79, Sprint is buffed and with no mana cost! I'd prefer you to grab this early on if youre not going for fast hyperstone.
AbilityTooltips.slardar_slithereen_crush:
Your reliable stun, Low CD, too. Gives good damage for ya, Duration is (not) enough to deal decent amount of punches to your foes.
Please do note that the damage is physical, but the stun is magical, which means if you use your ult first and then this, Your stun hurts even more!
AbilityTooltips.slardar_bash:
Bonus damage and stun that procs in any chance while youre bashing their face. 2 levels of Sprint and max this out, or get one level of this at level 4 and max out sprint.

Remember, Having ONE POINT OF BASH, can save your life and secure kills.
AbilityTooltips.slardar_amplify_damage: By 6.79 now, You can shatter down 10 armor AT A WHOPPING LEVEL 1  which means more physical damage and your stun damage!
